hero.description: Atomik turns ideas into scoped, test-verified tasks and delivers production-ready code through vetted developers — faster, safer, and fully auditable.

agents.title: Meet Your New Workforce
agents.subtitle: A specialized team of AI agents working in concert to ship your vision.
agents.analystQuote: I scan thousands of market signals in seconds so you don't have to guess what features to build.
agents.pmQuote: I turn your messy brain dumps into pristine, developer-ready application specs.
agents.designerQuote: I ensure your UI isn't just functional, but pixel-perfect and accessible by default.
agents.devopsQuote: I handle the plumbing. CI/CD, infrastructure, and deployment are my playground.
agents.qaQuote: I break things before your users do. If there's a bug, I'll find it.
agents.securityQuote: I keep the gates locked. Vulnerabilities don't stand a chance on my watch.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: You get production-ready code that passes your specifications and automated tests. It's not a prototype; it's a merged pull request.
faq.q2: How do you prevent bad work?
faq.a2: We don't rely on reviews. We rely on tests. If the code doesn't pass the provided test suite, the developer doesn't get paid. The system is binary.
faq.a3: Currently we are optimized for modern web stacks: React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, and TypeScript. More specific constraints can be defined in your specs.
faq.a4: Most micro-tasks are claimed within minutes and completed within 12 hours. You can parallelize dozens of tasks to build features overnight.
faq.a5: You do. 100%. Code is work-for-hire and ownership transfers upon payment release from escrow.
faq.a6: Payouts are instant upon verified test completion. We handle the escrow and transfer, developers get paid in USD or USDC.

investor.title: Ready to invest?
investor.subtitle: Get access to our investor materials

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide when you sign up for our waitlist, request access, or contact us.
privacy.section2Content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you about products, services, and events, and respond to your comments, questions, and requests.
privacy.section3Content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except to provide services you've requested, when required by law, or to protect our rights.
privacy.section4Content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the security of your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.section5Content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also opt out of receiving promotional communications from us at any time.
privacy.contactContent: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at hello@atomik.dev.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Content: By accessing or using Atomik's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using our services.
terms.section2Content: You may use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use our services in any way that violates any applicable law or regulation.
terms.section3Content: All code delivered through Atomik becomes your property upon payment release from escrow. You receive full ownership and rights to use, modify, and distribute the code as you see fit.
terms.section4Content: Payments are held in escrow until work is verified through automated testing. Upon successful verification, funds are released to the developer. Disputes are resolved through our objective arbitration process.
terms.section5Content: Atomik shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of our services.
terms.section6Content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms of Service on this page.
terms.contactContent: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at hello@atomik.dev.
